attributes.action: SubsidIse the basics of human rights namley water,heat,and Light
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With so much importance attatched to the bill of human rights surley every individual should have the right to cheap and affordable,heating ,water and electric.It appears to be the case that these fundamental basic human needs are sold to make profits for big multi national companies.Remember that these resources are natural products that should not be profitised.As such I would ask that these industries be nationalised/or subsidised and the public should only have to pay for the cost of administration .Why should familys be financialy burdened for what is the basics of HUMAN RIGHTS
